website_summaries.verdict: Quality fastpitch softball bat from a well-respected manufacturer. We appreciate the low friction double-wall design and the extra-large sweet spot.
pros: Composite construction improves pop and distance
Light swing weight but highly durable
Approved by ASA, USSSA, and NSA
cons: Bat may be end-loaded, not as balanced as promoted
Some reports of chipping and cracking

customer_reviews.title: This is a great composite bat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great composite bat. My daughter was barely hitting over the infielder's heads before she got this bat. She is now regularly hitting doubles to the deep outfield. In smaller parks, she has hit a few home runs. I originally thought the additional distance the batter gets from a composite bat was overstated, but I'm now a believer. This bat has a good reputation and is widely used, based on my observations at the softball tournaments I have been to.
customer_reviews.author: GregL

customer_reviews.title: Great bat!!
customer_reviews.text: Good bat with great pop. My 13 year old plays select and everyone on the team loves this bat. Still breaking it in but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: This bat is helpful piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This bat was purchased for my 15 yr old daughter. She plays for her high school varsity team. She is very pleased with it. She says it has a nice pop. She hit her first ever out of the park, grand slam home run. She has a great hitting coach but the bat sure helped! We were never one to pay $100’s for equipment, but this was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bat is a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Just received bat but looks like the 2017 Zeno is gonna be a hit (pun intended). Daughter has more confidence with it and ball really pops off bat.
customer_reviews.author: Don Spurlin

customer_reviews.title: Now at 16 playing in many levels of travel I can say she loves this bat even better then her lxt
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been playing ball since 5 years old. Now at 16 playing in many levels of travel I can say she loves this bat even better then her lxt. She was taught early to hit hard grounders and not fly balls. Most would hit the fence and bounce back. Hit her first home run off this bat. She is impressed with the pop
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This bat is not right barrel is gritty,bat gives no pop at all and hand grip already coming undone. My daughter has had Xenos most of her career and has never hated any of them until now. One of her teammates tried it and said the same thing... completely dead! It’s weird that there is a made in China stamp on the barrel. None of her previous had this either
customer_reviews.author: amanda tucker

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!!! She used at ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it !!! She used at her first game of the season and hit a home run....It's a little pricey but worth it....
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love The Louisville Xeno. Tons of pop right out of the wrapper. No issues with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Trent L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money I paid for it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy about receiving this bat for her birthday. She used it for 1 season, and the bat is now broken! It is about to snap in half where the barrel meets the handle! It was very well taken care of, so it is not an issue of mishandling! I'm not happy that I spent that much money on a bat and it lasted less than a year!
customer_reviews.author: D. Troia,RN

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat for A Big Hitter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the Xeno bats, and when her 2015 model broke during the summer I ordered this 2017 model. Hot bat that seems comparable to previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: The Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bat for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bat for my daughter. It changed her game! She hit her first homerun with this bat and was told she hit it farther than any other girl her age had ever done on that field!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Adds power
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. Sound a bit to get used to. But great sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: J Man

customer_reviews.title: Think we got a defective bat
customer_reviews.text: Bat broke halfway through the season but Louisville Slugger sent us a 2019 model because bat was still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Middle School Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Please get in touch with me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who do I get in touch with about this bat it broke and I need to get in touch with someone about this matter
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Great performance
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great performance. My daughter loves how it handles. She is very happy with this bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Hitter
customer_reviews.text: Think this is going to work out perfectly. Hit a triple 1st time at bat.
customer_reviews.author: morgan lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, everything we expected and quick delivery!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time and my daughter love it
customer_reviews.author: Duane S Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pop right out of the box. Daughter hit homerun in first tournament using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bat! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bat! A couple of the girls on her team have used it and they love it too! This bat has so much pop that even a check swing sends the ball deep.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: Great bat and makes the ball fly. This is my Daughter's second Xeno, and it only took two at bats for her to finally launch one over the fence. She has always loved the Xeno and will be her bat for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: stonemiser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for an avid softball player and it is the specific one she requested
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about durability because it's pretty new but my daughter loves the extra distance it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very live bat with plenty of pop! Not sure about durability because it's pretty new but my daughter loves the extra distance it provides!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Best bat for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the wrapper, this bat became a favorite of my daughter's select team. Half of her 12-u team uses her bat. Big pop.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ziebell

customer_reviews.title: she is very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: gift for granddaughter, she is very happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: IBGmax4

customer_reviews.title: Bat chips easily
customer_reviews.text: Had this bat a little over a month and the bat has a couple huge chips in it already. One of the chips is on the handle and irritates my daughter's hand every time she uses it. I have emailed the company and still waiting to hear back. Will only give a one star until I hear back
customer_reviews.author: tdegen

customer_reviews.title: Hot out of the wrapper.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bat for my niece just before state and she hit her first home run with it. These bats are hot out of the wrapper. She hit so well with it most of our girls on the team ditched there bats and used my nieces bat...lol. There's a reason why these are a popular bat. Great quality and also very dependable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: Love the Xeno
customer_reviews.text: HOT!! out of the plastic. We broke it in on the hurricane and can't wait to see her use it in the game. I can already tell it is a hot bat with a huge sweet spot. Definitely worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Tim

product_meta.title: Louisville Slugger Xeno Plus 17 (-10) Fast Pitch Softball Bat
product_meta.description: Louisville Slugger 2017 Xeno Plus (-10) Fastpitch Softball Bat Purple/Blue WTLFPXN170. The most popular bat in the Fastpitch game brings even more to the plate, with its Performance PLUS Composite and zero-friction double-wall design allowing the barrel to reach its maximum flex without resistance. The patented S1iD barrel technology give the Xeno PLUS the right mix of undeniable power, massive sweet spot, superior balance and lighter swing weight. The patented 2-piece iST technology in the transition from handle to barrel eliminates negative feedback on mis-hit balls, and now this iST technology features a stiffer feel for energy transfer. -10 Drop. Color: Purple/White/Blue. WTLFPXN170
feature_bullets: Performance PLUS Composite with zero friction double wall design
